brief_summary.textblock: safe study of Chinese Herbs to Treat Thyroid Diseases With Different Iodine

clinical_study.brief_title: the Effect of Chinese Herbs to Treat Thyroid Diseases With Different Iodine Intake

detailed_description.textblock:
Based on the previous studies, the research choose the patients with different iodine
      intake,and improve our original Chinese Herbs thyroid III formula, in order to provide the
      patients the best individual treatment plan.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  patient with thyroid diseases

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  not meet the diagnostic criteria,women with pregnancy or lactation ,drug allergy
             ,need surgery

intervention.description: two agent per day, twice a day
two agent per day, twice a day

clinical_study.official_title: the Effect of Chinese Herbs to Treat Thyroid Diseases With Different Iodine Intake

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment
